subject: Junit & CORBA
msgSnippet: Has anybody developed tests with Junit in a CORBA environment?  The code I am testing uses CORBA extensively and I was wondering if I should even go down the
messageBody:
Has anybody developed tests with Junit in a CORBA
environment? The code I am testing uses CORBA
extensively and I was wondering if I should even go
down the path of using Junit or just develop tests
without junit.

Ty
